peril.views.slick.states

Class InteractiveState

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.newdawn.slick.state.BasicGameState
      • peril.views.slick.states.InteractiveState
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.newdawn.slick.ControlledInputReciever, org.newdawn.slick.ControllerListener, org.newdawn.slick.InputListener, org.newdawn.slick.KeyListener, org.newdawn.slick.MouseListener, org.newdawn.slick.state.GameState, Container
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CoreGameState, Credits, EndState, Instructions, LoadingScreen, MainMenu, Opening, PlayerSelection

    public abstract class InteractiveState
extends org.newdawn.slick.state.BasicGameState
implements Container
    A BasicGameState that allows the user to click on Button and displays Viewable objects. It is also a Container.
    Since:
    2018-03-07
    Version:
    1.01.04
    Author:
    Joshua_Eddy, Gurdeep_Pol
    See Also:
    Container, BasicGameState

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.Map<java.lang.String,Button> buttons
      A Map of Button names to their Buttons elements that this InteractiveState has.
      private java.util.List<Component> components
      Holds all the Components that will be initialised when this InteractiveState is initialised.
      private Frame frame
      The Frame that displays the InteractiveState to the user.
      protected GameController game
      Holds the GameController that allows the InteractiveState to interact with the game.
      private int helpId
      Holds the id of the HelpMenu page that explains this InteractiveState.
      private int id
      The id of this InteractiveState.
      private java.util.Set<Viewable> images
      A Set of Viewable elements that this InteractiveState has.
      protected SlickGame slick
      The SlickGame that allows the InteractiveState to interact with the visual representation of the game.
      private java.lang.String stateName
      Holds the name of a specific InteractiveState.

      • render

        public final void render(org.newdawn.slick.GameContainer gc,
                         org.newdawn.slick.state.StateBasedGame sbg,
                         org.newdawn.slick.Graphics g)
                  throws org.newdawn.slick.SlickException
        Called as part of slick2d's game loop. Renders this state to the game's graphics context. Draws all the Buttons then the Viewable objects.
        Specified by:
        render in interface org.newdawn.slick.state.GameState
        Parameters:
        gc - The game window.
        sbg - The StateBasedGame this state is a part of.
        g - A graphics context that can be used to render primitives to the accelerated canvas provided by LWJGL.
        Throws:
        org.newdawn.slick.SlickException
